sourcesContent:
Welcome To our Site

{{p.animeName}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DbServiceService } from '../services/db-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { arr:any=[]; constructor(private db:DbServiceService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getAllPhoto(); } getAllPhoto(){ this.db.getAllPhoto().subscribe(res=>{ this.arr=res; for(let i of this.arr) { i.image='data:image/jpeg;base64,'+i.image; } console.log(res); // console.log(this.retrieveResonse); // console.log(this.retrieveResonse.image) }) } addToUserFavorite(p:any){ let data={'animeName':p.animeName} this.db.addToUserFavorite(data).subscribe(data=>{ console.log(data); let btn:any; btn=document.getElementById(p.animeName); btn.style.color="#ff0000"; } // ,error:e=>alert(`${e.message}\n${e.status}`)} ) } }
